{{also|pommes frites|pommes frites'}} ==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|de|fr|pommes frites||''lit.'' fried apples (of the earth)}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˌpɔmˈfʁɪt/}} * {{audio|de|De-Pommes frites.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|p}} # [[french fries]], [[chips]] ====Usage notes==== * There is also an uncommon singular form {{m|de|Pomme frite|g=f}}. ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|n=pl}} ====Synonyms==== * {{l|de|Fritten|g=f-p}}, ''singular'' {{l|de|Fritte|g=f}}, * {{l|de|Pommes|g=f-p}} * {{l|de|Pommfritt}}, {{l|de|Pommfritts|g=p}} [[Category:de:Foods]]
